House, Mike Pence said Republicans "welcome the president's call" for Social Security reform. "I think the only danger House Republicans have today is in not being bold enough," he said. I think the American people are tired of half-measures. They're looking for men and women at every level of government who are willing to step up and speak the truth and to offer positive solutions to deal with the fiscal crisis that we're facing. That includes domestic spending. That includes reasonable pruning and efficiencies within our defense complex. But it also includes entitlement reform.
